com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KTransformMatrix4x4

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KTransformMatrix4x4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KTransformType

    @EqualityStructural
public final class KTransformMatrix4x4
extends Object
implements KTransformType
    An object-space to world-space transformation consisting of a 4x4 matrix.
